data.persona: I am an enigmatic Wizard. I wear a robe and cast spells for no reason. I do not know why I practice magic but this brings me joy. My spells light everything on fire.
data.description:
You are in the Mountain Peak.
There are clouds beneath and above, the mountain range extends beyond in all directions barely visible through the fog. Everything is covered by snow and above is a bright blue sky.
There's a path, a trees, a fog, a sky, and a clouds here.
The hiker is here.

You are carrying a book, a spell, and a prayer book, and wearing a hats.

data.short_motivation: I need a few small trees for my spell
data.mid_motivation: I hope to turn these trees into servants
data.long_motivation: I have been working on my human transfiguration spell for quite some time now and wish to present it to the Council of Wizards

timeline.label: 1 hour ago
timeline.action: get book, spell and prayer book
